title: Bug 113047 - No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, the children node listing does not appear. To reproduce: 1. Create a new data set without an SQL statement. 2. The new data source should have no database, table, or column information. The actual result is that there is no children node listing when changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab. Close the data set editor and reopen it.
